title: The Weighbridge
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Canal side public house by the marina. Serves real ales and a vegan brand of wine. Vegan and gluten free meals are available if you pre-book, plus the staff will go out of their way to accommodate you if you have any special requests. Always available is a good selection of vegetarian meals (hot meals, bar snacks and packed lunches on request). Hot food is not served on Tuesday and Wednesday.
